body.name: PrimaSleep Twin Mattress, 10 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Gel Infused for Comfort and Pressure Relief, CertiPUR-US Certified, Bed-in-a-Box, Medium Firm, Grey, Twin Size
features: [ 4 Layers ] - 1.5" Cooling Gel Memory Foam + 1.5" High Density Foam + 2.5" Convoluted High Density Foam + 4.5" High Density Foam
[ Temperature Regulating ] - Cooling gel memory foam disperses body heat and regulates temperatures, creating a pleasant sleeping experience while maintaining the right body temperature
[ Pressure Relieving ] - Responsive, medium firm, foam layers adapt and conform to unique body contours, providing optimal comfort while targeting all pressure points
[ Stable Support ] - Durable high density foam guarantees stable support through excellent motion transfer and uniform weight distribution

[ Premium Cover ] - Polyester spandex grey jacquard fabric resists wrinkles and enhances flexibility & durability, ensuring the CertiPUR-US certified mattress is both breathable and protected against moisture, dust and debris
[ Bed-in-a-Box ] - Smart shipping & delivery with vacuum-sealed packaging technology. Please allow the product to rest in room temperature for 72 hours to fully expand and recover
body.description: PrimaSleep 10 Inch Grey and White Gel Memory Foam Mattress offers temperature control, pressure relieving comfort, and painless sleep experience.We create a multi-layer structure for maximum comfort and reliability. I-Gel foam provides heat transfer and temperature regulation. Its high responsiveness allows the medium firm foam to quickly adapt to body shapes and movements, for pressure relief and motion isolation. The convoluted foam targets pressure points and promote airflow. High density foam gives support and integrity.The durable polyester spandex fabric wicks moisture and protects against dust and debris. The mattress provides exceptional comfort, support and temperature regulation. With perfect motion isolation, supportive design and temperature regulation, PrimaSleep's mattress guarantees the best sleep quality you've ever experienced.PrimaSleep's vision is to elevate sleep experience by incorporating proprietary technologies and innovative solutions that boast exceptional quality and offer unique features.Material- Polyester Spandex Jacquard: Polyester spandex cover provides breathability, flexibility, and dust protection.- I-Gel Foam: Cool gel infused memory foam technology designed to keep temperature cool through the night.- HD Foam: High density foam & memory foam synergy provides enhanced support and top comfort experience.- Convoluted Foam: Textured foam improves weight distribution, comfort, and air circulation.Product's Certifications- CFR 1632/1633: Certification of mattress for standard flammability resistance.- CertiPUR-US: Certification of polyurethane foam for indoor emissions, product performance, physical durability, and environmental responsibility.- OEKO-TEX: Certification of textile product for human and natural ecosystems safety.Product comes with a 10-year Manufacturer Warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If I had based my decision to purchase on product reviews, I likely would have passed on this mattress. However, a VRBO stay was my introduction to this mattress and 4 months after purchase, I'm not disappointed. A relative (at same VRBO) who usually recommends a Tempurpedic was extremely impressed with the comfort and restful sleep experience as well. A few details: mattress does need 72+ hours to fully expand (may not be full 10" but it was close), medium firmness with decent edge support, gel does sleep cooler than regular Tempurpedic foam topper used for a few years prior, and the queen was slightly longer than old box spring being used as platform. One surprise - I'm a sidesleeper but found I can comfortably sleep on my stomach like I did in my youth! Obviously, not sure of mattresses life span, but based on the price, dont think I'll be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son. It is honestly more comfortable than expected. Good deal for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great after 3 years (and counting!)
reviews.reviewText: I was reading about 1000 reviews on beds before finally committing to one. I will update this review in time to see how it performs in the future, but for now I wanted to add to the reviews the overwhelmed shoppers like myself will see. I wrote this review after having it for 2 weeks, but now after 3 years, my positive comments still hold up!Overall, I absolutely love this bed. It came right when it was promised, and I let it expand for nearly the entire 48 hour recommended time. It's only gotten to around 9", but I'm not too worried about it, it's comfortable and a very good size as is, wouldn't change a thing. There was a slight chemical smell that has gone away as I let the mattress rise. I also read that people had trouble with fiberglass... well don't remove the cover. I believe it is to protect the mattress from some liquids, and it isn't intended to be removed. So I avoided that and don't have a problem with it at all.My biggest worry was mold. Thankfully no other reviews mentioned mold, so I thought I was safe. And when I received it, there was no appearance or smell of mold whatsoever. Good stuff!When people explain that it is both soft and firm, they are absolutely right. The first maybe 2 inches are soft, while the rest is supported by a more firm foam. This allows me, a small 120lb woman, to sink in but not keep sinking in. I hated memory foam because I would never sink the way I wanted so it felt way too firm. I really feel like I am supported in all the ways I need to be. I have never woken up in any pain, and I have even been sleeping all the way through the nights. I guess you don't realize how much you were suffering on a bad mattress until you get a new one!Finally, it is even a very comfortable mattress for 2! I don't find my arm getting sore or loosing circulation in any cuddling positions so far. I know that is a little weird, but for anyone looking for a mattress for 2, I hope it helps. The "medium" feel of both soft and firm has kept us both very happy, as I am someone who loves a soft bed, and him firm.The other biggest complaint I've read is that it doesn't last very long, so I updated my review about a year later. So far, it works just as well as the first day I got it! I'm still so comfortable!!I am updating again after 3 years. I am still so happy and comfortable on it! It does feel like the top "soft" later got a little softer, but the high density part beneath remains wonderfully supportive. I also don't feel like the additional softness over time is a bad thing by any means. My husband and I do not fall to the middle anywhere, and still cuddle comfortably through the full night.The only bad thing is that I babysat for a dog who loved thrashing around on a bed, and I think his nails caused some small kind of pilling effect on the top foam layer. But even with that, I don't feel it and it doesn't affect the function of the mattress. You only notice if you are running your hand over the bed and looking for it.After 3 years, I could not be happier. I want everyone to have this mattress!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought for my Grandson
reviews.reviewText: My 7 year old grandson needed a new mattress. This came fast and he is sleeping really well on it. I am really glad I chose this one. It 'fluffs' back up nicely and is very supportive. (I know fluffs isn't the right term but I couldn't remember the right one. LOL) The price was good and the quality is excellent. I'd buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I seem to have bought a lot of mattresses over the last few years. Six or seven. I always by fairly inexpensive memory foam ones ($3-400) and all who sleep on them are very happy including myself. This one was for a guest bedroom so I bought this less expensive one. Upon opening it up, it swelled up predictably and has formed a fine shape. It did take over a week for the smell to dissipate but that was only to be expected. It's only been used a handful of times so far but it seems to be perfectly comfortable, supportive and sag-free. Comparable to our other mattresses. One of the above ratings is for softness which is a bit of a daft metric. It's quite firm, which I like but I couldn't exactly give it 5 stars for softness nevertheless the fabric is pleasantly soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this mattress for my son. Super comfortable to sleep in. Great quality. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mattress I've Ever Slept On
reviews.reviewText: I was extremely skeptical about buying this mattress. Boy, was I wrong! I'm 68 and I've been picky about my bed for many years. I've paid upwards of $1000 for a mattress several times. A good night's sleep is so important. Now that I'm older I was unhappy with a firm mattress as I would get sore spots - hips, shoulders, ribs, anywhere that the pressure was too much. So I thought about a foam mattress. Upon looking, I saw that this mattress had pages of great reviews, including ones that claimed they didn't wake up with sore spots. I checked the return policy and felt safe trying this one out. I was pretty sure it would be going back.I've now had the best night's sleep that I've experienced in years. This mattress is unbelievably comfortable. There were zero issues with it expanding and it was ready enough for me in 24 hours. I have no idea how high it got and I didn't care. I was just desperate to be comfortable and rested so I used it the second night.Everyone is looking for different things in a mattress, so I'm sure this isn't for everyone, but for me it was the perfect mattress at an unbelievably good price. It came sooner than promised and was perfectly packaged, clean and relatively odor free. I couldn't be happier with this purchase and I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.On a side note, I have a small bedroom and wanted the bed to have as small a profile as possible. I ordered the Amazon Basics Foldable Metal Platform Bed Frame with Tool Free Setup. Listed price at this time is $119, but I checked the "new and open box" listing and got it for $70. The listing said "used" but it was not. This frame was exceptionally well suited as it is a "platform" frame, so it supports a mattress without the need for a box spring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice thick mattress
reviews.reviewText: Nice mattress. Fluffed up right out of bag. Nice thickness when fully inflated and comfy. Got for daybed for teenage boy. He sleeps well on it.
